Package application

Class EditorController

java.lang.Object
application.EditorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class EditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
The EditorController class, represents the Edit existing recipe view, and connects UI with back end and implements EventHandler to get action events from JavaFX and Initializable to switch scenes and update certain models.
Author:
Reed Olm - avr414 - UTSA CS 3443 - CookingCompanion 2021

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handle​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Overrides handle event to get button action events from JavaFX, branching if-statements detect each specific button buttons include: Exit, Save, add/remove ingredient, add/remove tag, add/remove instruction
    void initialize​(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
    Overrides initialize event to initialize previously declared FXML data and data containers
    private void putSelectedListItemInBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    MouseEvent action event detector, that allows program to detect which list/table/column was clicked, then gather the item that was clicked, and will place the item into it's respective input box, this allows the user to select an item to delete easily
    private void readData()
    Function that reads from recipes.csv, and places the parsed information into the recipes ArrayList for the current view.
    private java.lang.String readPass()
    Function that reads from pass.csv, and returns the name of the Recipe we are editing
    private void saveData​(java.lang.String overwrite)
    Takes the information from the view to save it to file.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • handle

      public void handle​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Overrides handle event to get button action events from JavaFX, branching if-statements detect each specific button buttons include: Exit, Save, add/remove ingredient, add/remove tag, add/remove instruction
      Specified by:
      handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent to get ActionEvent (ActionEvent)

    • putSelectedListItemInBox

      private void putSelectedListItemInBox​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      MouseEvent action event detector, that allows program to detect which list/table/column was clicked, then gather the item that was clicked, and will place the item into it's respective input box, this allows the user to select an item to delete easily
      Parameters:
      event - MouseEvent to get MouseEvent (MouseEvent)

    • readData

      private void readData() throws java.io.IOException
      Function that reads from recipes.csv, and places the parsed information into the recipes ArrayList for the current view.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • saveData

      private void saveData​(java.lang.String overwrite) throws java.io.IOException
      Takes the information from the view to save it to file. If the name of the current recipe is already in storage, it will be overwritten and saved anew.
      Parameters:
      overwrite - name of the current recipe, if it already exists, it will overwrite it in the file (String)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
